bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of either a feeling of dry mouth and lips, or an appearance of cracked lips. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 36: 口噤唇乾，血為斷絕，腹滿不言，其人如醉，未死之間，為不 可治 , “Clenched jaw and desiccated lips . The bloodflow is interrupted. A feeling of abdominal fullness, and speechlessness. Such patients appear as if intoxicated, shortly prior to death. They cannot be cured”.
